question:
Waqaas is nuts about writing novels. Hashem adores comic books. Mashhood is indifferent to graffiti art. Raith admires camping trailers. Jaidyn prizes cheese making. Sharland reviles the color plum. Benedict respects playing checkers. Shawnpaul damns astronomy hobby. Maxx cherishes the color pink. Rian exults in steak. Kaleb puts up with modern dancing. Anndra gripes about compassion. Ceirin finds pleasure in painting miniatures. Rorie scorns visiting museums. Blake overlooks geology. Damien glories in segways. Nathan bears ice cream. Aedan exults airplanes. Salvador stomachs archaeology. Miller applauds baking bread. Tyra rejoices in listening to jazz. Girius deifies brewing beer. Jamey execrates tacos. Jensen blasts composting. Kyrillos dislikes the color salmon. Kyrran likes brownies. Roary fancies playing the cello. Callie is neutral toward playing cricket. Mario curses pottery making. Sudais reviles compassion. Oliver yearns for playing violin. Jai-Rajaram relishes salsa. C-Jay stomachs deer. Eli scorns sandwich. Ian can’t stand fencing. Marwan exults tractors. Peregrine finds pleasure in hip-hop dancing. Geordan deifies composting. Didier idolizes making coffee. Niven is addicted to composing music. Garren reviles snakes. Bohbi curses playing table tennis. Renars overlooks diving. Keiran eschews 3D printing. Keelin bemoans the color yellow. Haydn laments the color eggplant. Decklan neglects snakes. Judah yearns the color fuchsia. Coray is apathetic about climbing. Eric scorns the color silver. Jaiden disdains cars. Dinaras likes vegetable soup. Abdisalam adores bears. Vince loathes stargazing. Ivar is passionate about the color yellow. Corey likes archaeology. Adrian exalts curry. Oskar applauds buffaloes. Malakhy rejoices in building model airplanes. 
Who finds pleasure in painting miniatures? Reply with a name enclosed within triple angle brackets, like <<<name>>>.
